name: ShowDynamicRange
author: AFNI
description: The script checks the dynamic range of the time series data at locations inside the brain.

inputs.description: Input EPI time series dataset (e.g. epi.nii.gz)
inputs.name: Input file

output-files.description: Dataset showing the percent signal change that an increment of 1 digitized value in the time series corresponds to.
output-files.name: Percent signal change dataset

output-files.description: Dataset showing the number of discrete levels used to represent the time series.
output-files.name: Dynamic range dataset
